title: Action - Volume 2 - Cyberpunk Edition
description: 10 powerful orchestral action themes and digital synthesizers mixed with epic elements
longDescription:
Preview on YouTube


Action - Volume 2 is a modern take on the Action collection by FAM featuring aggressive synth and Cyberpunk vibes mixed with energetic epic elements. Multiple loops, stings and short edits included for a complete editing solution.

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.Â 


Heroes Will Prevail: Full length (02:05), 9 Loops, 3 Edits, 1 Intro, 2 Outro

Hammers Of War: Full length (01:20), 11 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro

Rise Of The Mech: Full length (00:49), 6 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro

Danger Incoming: Full length (01:54), 10 Loops, 3 Edits, 1 Intro, 2 Outro

Fight For Your Life: Full length (01:55), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, 1 Intro, 2 Outro

Face Your Fear: Full length (01:51), 13 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro

Destiny In Danger: Full length (01:47), 10 Loops, 2 Edits, 1 Intro, 2 Outro

Open The Gates: Full length (01:37), 8 Loops, 1 Edits, 1 Intro, 2 Outro

Times Of War: Full length (01:36), 6 Loops, 2 Edits, 1 Intro, 2 Outro

The Enemy Line: Full length (01:27), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Action Vol.1
technicalDetails:
Features:


  • 10 Full length tracks
  • 26 Short edits
  • 84 Loops
  • 26 Intro & Outro


Number of Audio Wavs: 147

Number of Audio Cues: 147

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 1h, 11min, 44sec

Supported Development Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
